pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, November 26, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, November 26, 2016:

Antananarivo, Madagascar

7:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Philippe Couillard, Premier of Quebec, Brian Gallant, Premier of New Brunswick, and Marie-France Lalonde, Minister Responsible for Francophone Affairs of Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


9:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will be greeted by His Excellency Hery Rajaonarimampianina, President of the Republic of Madagascar, Mrs. Voahangy Rajaonarimampianina, First Lady of Madagascar, Her Excellency The Right Honourable MichaÃ«lle Jean, Secretary General of La Francophonie and Mr. Jean-Daniel Lafond        

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


10:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the La Francophonie Official Family Photo

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


12:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Official Luncheon given by the Secretary General of La Francophonie

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the Republic of Madagascar

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


2:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Plenary Session I

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will be greeted by the President of the Republic of Madagascar for the Official Dinner

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Official Dinner given by the President of the Republic of Madagascar

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Note: All times are local
